She was sitting upright in an over-sized pink crib, with nothing but a diaper on her but and a red shirt with a pink heart in the center. There was a pink pacifier around her neck. All her belongs were also pink, and she could even see baby toys on the ground. She could see a changing table with a stack of fresh white diapers.

"WHAT IS GOING ON?!" Clover yelled

Her babysitter came in. Whats the matter Clov-y? Does my little girl need a diapie wipie changey wangey?

"I was going to avoid that, because I thought you'd like it better this way. Oh, well.."

Right then she walked up to the crib and put the pacifier in Clover's mouth. Clover tried to take it out, but her mouth wouldn't stop sucking.

"Not, ut, uh.. You said that you wanted to be a baby if you'd be treated like one." Clover could feel her entire body start to recede. It was painful, she wanted it to stop. Sadly she couldn't open her mouth to express pain. She just kicked violently in her crib. While kicking, she accidentally made a poppy in her diaper. At this point she was 6, and the thought of doing so just made her want to cry more. She wanted comfort, she wanted her mommy. With all her mouth strength, she tried to let go of the pacifier. Before she knew it, waaa laaa, the pacifier was off. But she was now just one year old in a wet poppy diaper.

"Waaaaaaaaaaahhh! WaaaaaaaaaaaaH!!!"

"Don't worry, mommy is here and she will change you." She brought Clover to the changing table, while Clover was wailing like an infant.

She started singing her a tune, during the diaper changing. "Its O. K. Just let Mom-me wipe it away." She sung this tune several times till the last fold.

"There there.. Are we all better now."

12511112.content:
Although it was much of a shock to see their daughter in such an anthropomorphic state, Clover's mother was all the more sympathetic to her daughter's plight, as she was relieved that her transformed daughter wasn't gravely injured or worse. However, since WOOHP simply couldn't allow Clover to wander free in her current form without mass panic, Jerry decided to move Clover into a Government-funded estate stationed close to Beverly Hills.

However, since they were basically Clover's best friends and they wanted to help her, Sam and Alex decided to stay with Clover as her roommates, which made Clover feel all the more thankful that her friends were there for her, even if she was possibly now stuck as an Anthropomorphic Lioness for the rest of her life. Though, this still didn't excuse Clover from her duties as an Agent of the World Organization of Human Protection AKA WOOHP.

-----3 Weeks Later-----

Although, over the course of 3 long weeks, Sam and Alex noticed that Clover had become quite accustomed to her anthropomorphic form, feeling almost as if she was human again. And yet, the two friends slash fellow Spies also noticed a somewhat drastic...change, in Clover, almost as if she seemed to be getting faster, stronger, and enhanced overall. For example, when the three of them were exercising in the house's Indoor Gymnasium, both Sam and Alex witnessed Clover easily tear apart a full-body Punching Bag with her newfound feline claws, along with easily knocking down said punching bag with ease.

By the time Clover was done with the punching bag, it was riddled with claw marks and beaten to a pulp, which honestly surprised the two Spies greatly, reminding them not to get on Clover's bad side. Of course, upon further examination, they realized that the serum didn't just give Clover the anthropomorphic form of a Lioness, but also the strength, speed, agility, senses, and aggressiveness of one as well. Fortunately, thanks to some WOOHP scientists, they found out that Clover's feline abilities were actually triggered by surges of adrenaline.

Of course, it seemed that Clover was intentionally keeping herself under control, so to avoid inflicting any physical harm upon her friends. Plus, it seemed that Clover's altered physiology had apparently given her the dietary traits of a Lioness as well, preferring to eat slabs of meat not cooked or grilled, but raw, almost as if her wild feline instincts were telling her what feels and tastes right.

Overall, the last 3 weeks have been hectic for the three best friends and fellow Spies. Though, as for what exactly the 3 girls were currently doing, Sam, Clover, and Alex were...
12511112.title: A Government Home Away From Home

choices: From there, Sam & Alex began to explain what happened to Clover.
Fast forward to after their explanation to Queen Tassara.
125111121.content:
Lyrobia. An African nation known for it's rich metal ores, Lyrobia was ruled by Queen Tassara, who was aided by Sam, Clover, and Alex from a previous mission to protect her from being kidnapped by Kenopia, which was plotted by Tassara's own sister, Nikita, Kenopia's own General Bege. Fortunately, thanks to the efforts of Sam, Clover, and Alex, that conspiracy was foiled, which landed Nikita and General Bege in prison.

However, that wouldn't last for long. To elaborate, WOOHP just found out that Princess Nikita and General Bege had escaped from Lyrobian Prison, thanks to a battalion loyal to General Bege, who also stole some of the Anti-Gravity technology they used from before. So, with no time to lose, Jerry had sent Sam, Clover, and Alex off to Lyrobia once more. Only this time, things were much...different than before.

---Lyrobian Palace - 9:16 AM---

Eventually, after traversing through the southwestern Lyrobian Desert, Sam, Clover, and Alex were now inside the Main Hall of the Lyrobian Palace, slowly approaching Queen Tassara. However, unlike Sam and Alex who wore desert clothes, Clover had to wear this long hooded robe to cover up what had become of her from a previous mission, so to avoid causing any sort of panic from both the palace servants and palace guards alike.

Once they approached Queen Tassara, Sam, Clover, and Alex knelt down on one knee out of a respectful greeting toward Lyrobian Royalty, as Sam spoke up and said, "Your Majesty..." In response, Queen Tassara calmly greeted the trio with a reassured smile and replied, "Samantha, Clover, Alexandra! It is such a relief to see you all once again." "Same here, Your Highness." Alex answered, as Queen Tassara casually greeted the 3 WOOHP Spies with a friendly hug. After all, Tassara was very thankful for their aid in protecting her from the Kenopian conspiracy, thus she considered Sam, Clover, and Alex as good friends to the Lyrobian Queen.

But then, it was there that Tassara became aware of the hooded member of the trio, thinking that it must be Clover. But as she was about to undo the hood that kept Clover's anthropomorphic features hidden, Sam attempted to prevent Queen Tassara from doing so as she said, "Um, Your Majesty... I don't think Clover wants you to see her like this." "Don't fret, Samantha. I'm sure there is a reason why Clover is hiding herself, and I intend to know why." Tassara replied, as she slowly pulled down the hood behind Clover's head, which revealed the Human-Lioness hybrid that was Clover.

At first, upon witnessing such a shocking revelation, Tassara's expression was that of instinctive shock. However, Tassara soon was able to calm herself down, calling off the palace guards who became worried about their Queen's reaction. From there, Tassara's expression then turned into one of sympathy, becoming sympathetic toward Clover's current anthropomorphic physique, as the Lyrobian Queen then approached the feline Clover and said, "...I see. So, it seems that Jerry wasn't lying about your...predicament, Clover."

"...Wait, Jerry already told you about what happened to Clover?" Alex asked, becoming somewhat confused from such a revelation. So, in response to Alex's confusion, Queen Tassara spoke toward the 3 Spies and explained, "To elaborate, Alexandra, Mr. Jerry Lewis had given me an advanced warning to Clover's...transformation, into a Human-Lioness hybrid. At first, I simply thought it was a mere prank. However, now I see that there is some truth to his words."

From there, Tassara calmly approached her throne, where she then sat down and faced Sam, Clover, and Alex as she said, "...However, I would like to hear what exactly had transpired as to how Clover was transformed into her current state from you, my friends."
125111121.title: Returning To Lyrobia

choices: Then, Tassara received info on Nikita's whereabouts.
Suddenly, they were interrupted by a squad of General Bege's men!
1251111211.content:
Of course,since they wanted to clearly explain to Tassara what exactly transpired to have Clover be stuck with such an anthropomorphic appearance, both Sam and Alex willingly decided to elaborate on such a tale to Queen Tassara, as they each took a turn explaining a part of the story toward the Lyrobian Queen, where Sam was the first to speak and explained, "...Well, it all started when we were assigned by Jerry to investigate the sudden disappearance of a cruise liner known as the Juliet, which had disappeared in the Mediterranean Sea..."

"-When we got to the ship's last known coordinates, we discovered an uncharted island, but our ride was sucked underwater by a machine that creates man-made whirlpools. We followed this underwater pipeline all the way to that island..." Alex said, picking up where Sam left off in the story. From there, Sam eventually continued off from where Alex left off, as she spoke toward Queen Tassara and answered, "Eventually, when we made it deeper into the island, Clover was stung by a dart by Trode, who we later found out was working for fashion designer Helga Von Guggen. Apparently, she turned both the passengers and crew of the Juliet into half-human half-animal hybrids."

"But still, why would such a successful individual like Helga Von Guggen commit such a heinous act, Samantha?" Tassara asked, feeling like she was about to receive her answer soon, prompting Clover herself to respond, crossing her furry arms in frustration and lightly growled, "She wanted turn me and the other people she turned into fur coats. *growl*" "...What Clover here is saying, Your Highness, is that Helga Von Guggen wanted to turn the people she transformed into fur coats, so she could amass a decent fortune." Sam replied, giving Tassara a better understanding of Clover's blunt but angry response.

"...Anyway, getting back on topic. Unfortunately, we were then captured by Von Guggen and Trode, which led to Clover being shipped off to Genoa along with the Juliet's transformed passengers and crew. Fortunately, Sam and I were able to escape and imprison Trode, where Sam ended up making an antidote to change both Clover and the others back into ordinary people." Alex said, continuing the story where she and Sam previously left off prior to Clover interrupting.

Though, judging from the sympathetic expressions on both Sam and Alex's faces, Tassara could easily tell that something bad might have happened during that whole process, as she calmly spoke toward both Spies and asked, "...Judging from your expressions, I take it that something...horrible, might have happened during your mission?" "Oh no, Your Highness! We were able to change those people back to normal. It's just that Clover...she was given a more powerful dose of Helga's serum. It made her transformation permanent." Sam explained, finishing off their explanation to Queen Tassara, thus allowing the Lyrobian Queen comprehend what had transpired to have Clover appear with such an anthropomorphic physique.

15212211.content: Jerry gives them an assignment to go undercover at the Achieve Academy, a new private all girls school which recently has come out of the blue. The agency has reason to believe that the private school may be linked to recent disappearances of young girls in the area (who happen to be daughters of very rich and powerful people). Unfortunately the agency had not been able to get the girls hired as teachers so Jerry reveals to the girls that in order to go undercover they will be regressed into 8 year olds in order to blend in with the students of the private school. For age regression the girls are each handed a wearable device that regresses the user to any desired age while also changing their clothes to match the set age.
15212211.title: 8 year olds.

1521221111.content:
Sam is the first to try the device. She hesitates and looks at her friends before setting the device to 8 and activate the regression. The device emitted an surge of green energy into her body, which was already shrinking. Alex and Clover watched as their friend went form a college aged girl to an 8 year old.
When the regression was finally complete, there stood an 8 year old Sam, whose red hair was now in a ponytail. Her clothes changed from the green spy-suit to a simple set of a yellow shirt and green suspender skirt. And she was now even wearing a pair of glasses.
Clover couldn't help but chuckle at the 8 year old Sam "wow Sam, you never mention anything about needing glasses"
The 8 year old Sam pouted as she said, "Don't laugh at me!!!".
Alex knelt down to the little Sam and hugged her while saying,"It's ok Sam, besides you look so adorable in those glasses".

Who regresses next?
1521221111.title: Sam.

choices: Skip to the first day of class
15212211111.content:
Clover was the next to use the regression device as Alex was to busy cuing over the 8 year old Sam. Her device emitted a red energy into her body, but still had the same effects as the green energy of Sam's device as Clover watched everything around her get bigger and bigger. Though it was really her that was getting smaller and smaller. She gazed at her hands that were become more and more child-like. She also noticed that her red spy-suit was morphing into a little red dress fit for an 8 year old child.
When the regression was complete, the little Clover went to the mirror that happened to be in the room. Upon looking at the mirror instead of a blonde young college aged woman she saw the reflection of a blonde 8 year old girl wearing a little red dress. She also noticed that she was wearing a red hair band in her blonde air. The new 8 year old shout "OMG I LOOK SO CUTE" all the while posing in the mirror.

Alex herself finally quit smothering the 8 year old Sam, activating her device (which emitted a yellow energy into her body) and regressed into an 8 year old version of herself who was wearing little jean shorts and a simple yellow short with a pink heart on it.
"This feels so surreal" Alex said, "I'd never thought that I would be this young again".

Jerry gathered the 8 year old spies as he handed them numerous gadgets, which happened to be disguised as mundane school supplies, for the mission while also informing them that fellow WHOOP spy Britney would be assisting in the mission as well, going undercover as their "guardian".

15533221.content:
Somewhere in California, in Malibu University, Sam, Clover, and Alex were at the the coffee shop. After weeks of studying, the girls wanted to take a break from all of this and reminiscent on their studies.

"Man..." Clover said as she had her head on the table, "What a day. I never wanted to see another essay again."

Alex laid back and sipped her latte and agreed with her friend. "Tell me about it. High school was okay with us, but college gets extremely tougher. Never thought they can be so brutal."

Sam, on the other hand, smiled and said, "I don't know girls. They all seem easy for me."

The two gave her a deep glare and was a little annoyed by that. "Easy for you so say." Clover stated, "You are the one with an IQ of over a billion or more. You are a total brainiac." The two then gave a sigh and decided leave it at that.

During that time, Sam got an idea and decided to speak to the girls about it. "So girls..." Sam started asking a question, "Once we graduated from college, what's next for us."

The two looked to her and wondered what wanted. "What do you mean?" Alex asked her back.

"Well, we can't be in college forever and we need to think about our future." Sam explained as much as possible, "So, what do you want to do after College?"

Clover sat back up and explained her dream. "C'mon Sam. You know totally well that I wanted to be a fashion mogul, making the best fashions around the world. I am set after college."

"And I would like to be the best soccer athlete." Alex continued, "I had that dream since I was little. You, Sam? What will you do after graduation?"

Sam smiled and explained about her future. "Well, my dream is to be a professor in a Harvard. I think that would be perfect for me."

The two looked to each other and was very quiet for a moment. That was until they burst out in laughter, much to Sam's dismay. "Get out!" Alex said to her, "You're serious right? You want to be a a professor? That's, like, the most lamest job of all."

"And the most boring..." Clover finished.

Sam was annoyed and told the two that its not what they think. "I'll have you know that being a professor is a high paying and flexible job. Trust me, once I go to Harvard to teach, you will see how successful I am!"

The two just blinked and turned their heads away, saying in unison, "Whatevah!!"

Sam was starting to get a little aggravated, but soon relaxed and remembered something. "You know, as much as I want to be a professor, I'm beginning to wonder about WHOOP."

The two soon turned to their friend and was a little worried too. "Yeah..." Alex continued, "We have been in the spy game for so long. I wonder if we are ever able to move on with our lives with WHOOP behind us."

"Plus, we had many adventures together." Clover responded, "Got us out of our bored and normal lives. Wonder what will happen if we leave WHOOP?"

Sam then sighed and decided to not think of it yet. "I'm sure we'll think of something. I mean, we could still work for WHOOP, it's just that our schedule would be less flexible."

She soon got off the chair and left the table with her empty cup with Clover and Alex from behind. The two soon approached a trashcan and were about to toss their drinks away.

"I guess you have a point." Clover retorted, "Still, they could rethink the whole WHOOPing thing. I swear, if I start my fashion making career, the last thing I want is getting sucked into a storage compartment of a floor when I'm working on my designs."

They soon tossed their cups and were about to leave. But then, they could hear a strange sound coming from the trash bin. Returning to it, they opened it up to see what it is. That's when they heard a vacuuming sound that led them getting sucked up by the trash bin. They soon slide down a tube as they were screaming their lungs out.

"YOU HAD TO SAY WHOOPING!! DIDN'T YOU CLOVER!!!" Alex screamed to her as Clover made the argument. "HEY!!! I WASN'T EXPECTING THAT TO HAPPEN SO SUDDENLY!!!"

"WHATEVER THE REASON, JERRY BETTER HAVE A GOOD EXPLANATION!!!" Sam said back.

The three slid all the way down until an opening appeared in front of them. They soon fell to a velvet like sofa in what looks like an office. In front of them is a desk where Jerry was checking on something on his computer. Though he was focused on his work, he still have the time in welcoming the girls his own way.

"Good afternoon girls. Hope you didn't get trashed on the way down."

The three were in awkward positions on the sofa as they tried to sit upright and was a little annoyed by the joke.

"Well Jerry, the next time you WHOOP us, it better be someplace that won't ruin my outfits." Clover said in protest.

Sam lifted her hand to her friend and said, "This better be important, Jerry. We were done with our exams in college and we needed a long break out of all of this."

Jerry then looked to them and got down to business. "Actually, there is. You see..."
